content.description: predicting result of code (2017 Fall, Final, Question 10 a)

p.line: The question below uses a robot in a grid of squares. The robot is initially in the bottom-left square of the grid and facing up. Code for the procedure _BOLDS_Meander_BOLDE_ is shown here. Assume the input has been assigned a positive integer value (e.g., 1, 2, 3, ...). The _BOLDS_ROTATE RIGHT_BOLDE_ block has the same function as the _BOLDS_Turn 90 degrees_BOLDE_ block.
Which shows a possible result of calling _BOLDS_Meander_BOLDE_? (select ONE)

content.hint: It is drawing a square, clockwise.
